background: Provision a secure, private-only VPC web application stack in us-west-2 using CloudFormation. The stack includes private app subnets behind an internet-facing ALB (in dedicated egress subnets), an EC2 Auto Scaling Group (Amazon Linux 2023) with nginx, RDS (PostgreSQL/MySQL) in private DB subnets, KMS for encryption (S3, Logs, SSM, RDS, and optional EBS), S3 buckets for app data and logs, VPC Flow Logs, CloudTrail, SSM SecureString parameter via a Lambda-backed custom resource, and least-privilege IAM. The design enforces region guard, TLS-only S3 access, and robust logging.
author: iqbala-turing
